name: Baby ABC ZOO Splash Animals - Toddler's Preschool Educational Puzzles Games For Kids
name_original: Baby ABC ZOO Splash Animals - Toddler's Preschool Educational Puzzles Games For Kids
description:
******* Baby ABC ZOO Splash Animals *********
The joy of learning the ABC’s is quick and easy with interactive Animal ABCs flash cards.

Our Baby ABC ZOO Splash Animals teaches skills such as memory, listening, and movement into each fun lesson. Children will learn phonics and be able to connect letter sounds with animals, for example: A is for Ant/B is for Bee/C is for Cat. Children will also learn that each letter in the alphabet is a symbol that can be memorized and used to form words.

Educational Skills: alphabet; eye-hand coordination; letter-picture recognition; word-picture recognition

* 36 Animal Alphabet ABCs
* Free Ad-supported version.
* Language: US English
* Age Level: 1+
* Title: Baby ABC ZOO Splash Animals
